body: I guess that makes a lot of sense. however github.com/netbrain/importbug/foo is correctly  parsed with 	```buildPkg, err := build.Import("github.com/netbrain/importbug/foo", "", build.ImportComment)``` so why shouldn't bar be aswell? As far as i can tell both build.Import() and conf.Check() (line 40 in the test) both uses the build.Import() which points to gcimports.Import().
